Package processing.sound

Class SoundFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • processing.sound.SoundObject
      • processing.sound.AudioSample
        • processing.sound.SoundFile

  • public class SoundFile
extends AudioSample
    This is a Soundfile player which allows to play back and manipulate sound files. Supported formats are: WAV, AIF/AIFF, and MP3.
